description.lang: Inovelli's In-Wall Smart Switch (On/Off) not only has the ability to turn on and off appliances, lights, and more from anywhere in the world, but it acts as a Z-Wave signal repeater, which amplifies your Z-Wave signal, growing the capabilities of your network. In addition, it has scene control enabled, which allows you to double tap the switch to activate a Z-Wave scene. An example would be a bedtime scene, which turns off all lights, locks the door(s) and sets the temperature to 68 degrees.Simplifying lives, one smart home product at a time... that's Inovelli.
